mapper.select:
select
from cust_warranty WHERE warranty_uuid=#{_parameter} AND state=1

select `cust_warranty`.`id` id,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid` warranty_uuid,`pre_policy_no`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_code`,`cust_warranty`.`manager_uuid`,`cust_warranty`.`account_uuid`,`cust_warranty`.`agent_id`,`cust_warranty`.`channel_id`,`cust_warranty`.`plan_id`,`cust_warranty`.`product_id`,`cust_warranty`.`start_time`,`cust_warranty`.`end_time`, `cust_warranty`.`ins_company_id`,`cust_warranty`.`count`,`cust_warranty`.`pay_category_id`,`cust_warranty`.`is_settlement`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_url`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_from`,`cust_warranty`.`type`,`cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`,`cust_warranty`.`integral`,`cust_warranty`.`express_no`,`cust_warranty`.`express_company_name`, `cust_warranty`.`express_address`,`cust_warranty`.`express_province_code`,`cust_warranty`.`express_city_code`,`cust_warranty`.`express_county_code`,`cust_warranty`.`delivery_type`, `cust_warranty`.`created_at` created_at,`cust_warranty`.`updated_at` updated_at, `cust_warranty_car`.`car_code` car_code,`cust_warranty_car`.`frame_no` frame_no, `cust_warranty_person`.`name` policy_holder_name,`cust_warranty_person`.`phone` policy_holder_phone, `cust_warranty_cost`.`premium` premium,`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status` pay_status,`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_money` pay_money,`cust_warranty_cost`.`tax_money` tax_money, `cust_warranty_cost`.`actual_pay_time` actual_pay_time from cust_warranty LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_car` ON `cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_car`.`warranty_uuid` LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_person` ON `cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_person`.`warranty_uuid` AND `cust_warranty_person`.`type`=1 LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_cost` ON `cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_cost`.`warranty_uuid` AND `cust_warranty_cost`.`phase`=1
`cust_warranty`.`id`<#{page.lastId}
`cust_warranty`.`id`<=(select `cust_warranty`.`id` from cust_warranty LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_car` ON `cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_car`.`warranty_uuid` LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_person` ON `cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_person`.`warranty_uuid` AND `cust_warranty_person`.`type`=1 LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_cost` ON `cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_cost`.`warranty_uuid` AND `cust_warranty_cost`.`phase`=1 where `cust_warranty`.`account_uuid`=#{account_uuid} AND `cust_warranty`.`state`=1
AND `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=1 AND (`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status`= 201 OR `cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status` = 203 OR `cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status` = 204)
AND `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=2
AND `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=3
AND (`cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=5 OR `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=6)
AND 1=1
AND `agent_id` in (${agent_id_string})
AND `cust_warranty_person`.`type`=1 AND `cust_warranty_person`.`name` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
AND `cust_warranty_car`.`car_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
AND `warranty_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
and `cust_warranty`.`type`=#{type}
and `cust_warranty`.`created_at`>=#{start_time}
and `cust_warranty`.`created_at`<#{end_time}
ORDER BY `cust_warranty`.`id` DESC limit #{page.start},1 )
1=1
and `cust_warranty`.`account_uuid`=#{account_uuid} AND `cust_warranty`.`state`=1
AND `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=1 AND (`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status`= 201 OR `cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status` = 203 OR `cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status` = 204)
AND `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=2
AND `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=3
AND (`cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=5 OR `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=6)
AND 1=1
AND `agent_id` in (${agent_id_string})
AND `cust_warranty_person`.`type`=1 AND `cust_warranty_person`.`name` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
AND `cust_warranty_car`.`car_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
AND `warranty_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
and `cust_warranty`.`type`=#{type}
and `cust_warranty`.`created_at`>=#{start_time}
and `cust_warranty`.`created_at`<#{end_time}
ORDER BY `cust_warranty`.`id` DESC limit #{page.offset}

select COUNT(`cust_warranty`.`id`) from cust_warranty LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_car` ON `cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_car`.`warranty_uuid` LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_person` ON `cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_person`.`warranty_uuid` AND `cust_warranty_person`.`type`=1 LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_cost` ON `cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_cost`.`warranty_uuid` AND `cust_warranty_cost`.`phase`=1 where `cust_warranty`.`account_uuid`=#{account_uuid} AND `cust_warranty`.`state`=1
AND `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=1 AND (`cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status`= 201 OR `cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status` = 203 OR `cust_warranty_cost`.`pay_status` = 204)
AND `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=2
AND `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=3
AND (`cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=5 OR `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=6)
AND 1=1
AND `agent_id` in (${agent_id_string})
AND `cust_warranty_person`.`name` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
AND `cust_warranty_car`.`car_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
AND `warranty_code` like concat("%",#{search},"%")
AND `cust_warranty`.`type`=#{type}
AND `cust_warranty`.`created_at`>=#{start_time}
AND `cust_warranty`.`created_at`<#{end_time}

select
from cust_warranty
`warranty_uuid` in ( select `warranty_uuid` from cust_warranty_person where card_code=#{card_code} and card_type=#{card_type} and start_time<= #{end_time} and end_time>=#{start_time} and type=1 ) and `product_id`=#{product_id} and warranty_status!=6 and warranty_status!=7 and state=1 limit 1

select COUNT(`cust_warranty`.`id`) from cust_warranty LEFT JOIN `cust_warranty_person` ON `cust_warranty`.`warranty_uuid`=`cust_warranty_person`.`warranty_uuid` AND `cust_warranty_person`.`type`=#{person_type} AND `cust_warranty_person`.`card_type`=#{card_type} AND `cust_warranty_person`.`card_code`=#{card_code} where `cust_warranty`.`manager_uuid`=#{manager_uuid} AND `cust_warranty`.`state`=1 AND (`cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=2 OR `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=3 OR `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=4 OR `cust_warranty`.`warranty_status`=5)
